titles.title: Preventing Overprescribing for Pain Act of 2016
A bill to require the Director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to issue guidelines relating to the prescription of opioids for acute pain.
Preventing Overprescribing for Pain Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

term.name: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary:
Preventing Overprescribing for Pain Act of 2016
This bill requires the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to issue guidelines for the safe prescribing of opioids for the treatment of acute pain. (Opioids are drugs with effects similar to opium, such as certain pain medications.)
